dict.acceptation: 政策；策略；保险单；策略性；

sent.orig: This paper roundly analyzed the classic single airport ground-delay policy(GDP) model and multi-airport ground-delay policy(GDP) mode.
sent.trans: 系统地分析了单机场和多机场地面等待策略GDP(Ground-Delay Policy)经典模型。

sent.orig: Currently, WS-Policy is working a declarative and programmatic way to express the policy requirements.
sent.trans: 当前，WS-Policy是正在使用的标准化声明和编程方式来表达策略的需要。

sent.orig: Andrei's description of policy classes describe their power as being derived from their granularity and orthogonality.
sent.trans: Andrei对于policy类的描述说明他们的威力来自于他们的颗粒性和正交性。

sent.orig: Policy classes are implementations of punctual design choices.
sent.trans: policy类是严格设计的一个是实现。

sent.orig: This constructor exists for use by the Policy object instantiate new Permission objects.
sent.trans: 存在该构造函数是因为Policy对象要用来实例化新的Permission对象。
